descriptionlist.description: SimplyFlat11 was designed to be simple, flat and work in iOS 11.
The theme was created since there were 2 apps on my phone that were not already themed and it made me want to make my own theme.

SimplyFlat11 has icons for:
The Weather Network
PUBG Mobile
Pocket Planes
Calculator
App Store
and more to come!
